meanings.sent1: The mastless ship struggled to navigate the rough waters.
meanings.sent2: The sailboat was mastless after the storm destroyed its mast.
meanings.sent3: The mastless boat looked like a fish out of water.
meanings.sent4: The mastless flagpole stood bare against the sky.
meanings.sent5: The mastless vessel bobbed helplessly in the sea.

meanings.sent1: The mastless yacht had to rely on oars to move.
meanings.sent2: The mastless sail flapped uselessly in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The mastless ship seemed to have lost its way.
meanings.sent4: The mastless tree swayed in the breeze, missing its top.
meanings.sent5: The mastless boat drifted aimlessly on the lake.
